Content.Text:
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Wah, <MYNAME>! What're you doing here?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
T-Toni, we've been found out!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You want to know what we're doing? What
do you think? We're off to catch a rare
insect!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
S-Sorry for being out so late. This 
insect can only be caught at night, you
see.
<PAGE>
O-Once we find the insect we'll come
back. So please... just let us go?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
We're begging you, <MYNAME>! Can't you
just let us do this?
<PAGE>
If you don't, we're going to come by and
mess up your farm every day from now on!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
If you don't want us to go alone, why
don't you come along too, <MYNAME>?
Please!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
T-Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The insect we want to catch can often
be found in the mountains. Let's go.

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thanks for coming with us!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If it was just us, it was so dark... 
we would probably have been scared,
crying our eyes out...
<PAGE>
But with you along, <MYNAME>, it was a lot
of fun! Thanks so much!

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What!? Mom?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
D-Dad... what's going on?

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you think? I happened across
this note detailing your plan.
<PAGE>
Having discussed it was Rebecca, we
decided to let you have an adventure
every once in a while.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just in case anything happened, of
course, we followed along behind you.
I hope you appreciate it!

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We were both planning on punishing you,
to start with, but...
<PAGE>
But it reminded us of the adventures
that we had as kids, too.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm sure everything you did today will
become a great memory for you when
you're grown up, too.
<PAGE>
So we decided to give you a little
leeway. I don't know if that makes us
good parents, or bad ones!

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, Mom. Sorry for making you
worry!

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dad, thanks. I won't do anything like
this again.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>. Thanks for looking after both
of them.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Allow me to thank you too.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We'd better be getting back, anyway.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodnight, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
See you soon, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Goodnight.

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. What's up? Let's get
going.
